nodes.text: Nimban was the homeworld of the Nimbanese species. It was located in Hutt Space, along the Pabol Sleheyron.
Nimban was famous for voluntarily leaving the Galactic Republic in order to join the Hutts. In 11,939 BBY, the planet was victim of the Third Pius Dea Crusade.
During the Yuuzhan Vong War, Nimban was conquered by the invaders.
In Clone Wars Chapter 22, the planet Nelvaan is mistakenly referred to as "Nimban."
